scripts.build: mkdir -p ./public && cp -r ./node_modules/moorhen/public/* ./public/; cp -r ./node_modules/moorhen/types/ src/types; next build; cp -r public/* .next/standalone/.next/server/app; mkdir -p .next/standalone/.next/server/app/_next/; cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/.next/server/app/_next/static
scripts.make-mac: npm run build && electron-forge make --platform darwin
scripts.make-mac-intel: npm run build && electron-forge make --arch=x64 --platform darwin
scripts.make-mac-m1: npm run build && electron-forge make --arch=arm64 --platform darwin
scripts.make-mac-arm: npm run build && electron-forge make --arch=arm64 --platform darwin
scripts.make-linux: npm run build && electron-forge make --platform linux
scripts.make-linux-intel: npm run build && electron-forge make --arch=x64 --platform linux
scripts.make-linux-arm: npm run build && electron-forge make --arch=arm64 --platform linux
scripts.make-win32: npm run build && electron-forge make --platform win32
scripts.package-win32: npm run build && electron-forge package --platform win32
scripts.zip-win32: npm run package-win32 && cd out && zip -r Moorhen-${npm_package_version}-win32-x64.zip Moorhen-win32-x64
